title: GTS Team Branding
description: GTS Team is a tournament organiser within a game named osu!. The team hosts seasonal osu!taiko tournaments starting from beginner to expert division. The simple Logomark spells GTS was the mark that client finds interesting, simple, and memorable.

title: Kampoeng Mulang Logo
description: Kampoeng Mulang is a group of student within STMIK "AMIKBANDUNG" that accommodates students interest in multimedia, animation and games. The butterfly represents home and place of origin, the 4-way colours represent diversity of the design industry, creativity, and cappability.

title: Healthpoint
description: Healthpoint is a health & disease data-collection software and is based in Sukabumi, Indonesia. The project was developed during my internship, and I was appointed as the Project Manager and Fullstack Web Developer during the development.

title: SmartLIBRARY
description: SmartLIBRARY is a web-based library software that was developed for my junior highschool. The project used Laravel and MySQL as the tech and Bootstrap as the CSS Framework.
